description: Complete implementation of 60 skills across 17 professional profiles

userStories.title: Create auth-provider skill for centralized authentication
userStories.description: Foundation skill that manages OAuth tokens and API keys for all other skills
userStories.notes: BLOCKER: All other skills depend on this

userStories.title: Create google-oauth skill for Google services
userStories.description: Google OAuth adapter for Gmail, Calendar, Drive, Photos access
userStories.notes: Required by: email, calendar, drive, photos, receipts-ocr

userStories.title: Create binance-auth skill for trading API
userStories.description: Binance API key management for trading skills
acceptanceCriteria: Store API key and secret securely
userStories.notes: Required by: binance, alerts, portfolio, charts

userStories.title: Create quickbooks-auth skill for accounting
userStories.notes: Required by: quickbooks, reports

userStories.title: Create slack-auth skill for notifications
userStories.notes: Required by: slack, alerts, notifications

userStories.title: Create email skill for Gmail integration
userStories.description: Read, send, and manage Gmail messages
userStories.notes: Depends: google-oauth. Used by: inbox-triage, meetings, reminders

userStories.title: Create calendar skill for scheduling
userStories.description: Google Calendar integration for events and availability
userStories.notes: Depends: google-oauth. Used by: meetings, scheduler, showing-scheduler

userStories.title: Create reminders skill for task management
acceptanceCriteria: Daemon mode for checking due reminders
userStories.notes: No external deps. Used by: meetings, occasion-reminders, maintenance-scheduler

userStories.title: Create meetings skill for scheduling coordination
userStories.description: Coordinate meetings using calendar and email
userStories.notes: Depends: email, calendar

userStories.title: Create slack skill for team communication
userStories.description: Send messages and notifications to Slack channels
userStories.notes: Depends: slack-auth. Used by: alerts, notifications

userStories.title: Create binance skill for crypto trading
userStories.description: Trade and monitor crypto via Binance API
userStories.notes: Depends: binance-auth. Used by: alerts, portfolio, charts

userStories.title: Create alerts skill for price notifications
userStories.notes: Depends: binance. Uses model for notification text

userStories.title: Create portfolio skill for tracking positions
userStories.notes: Depends: binance. Uses model for analysis text

userStories.title: Create charts skill for price visualization
userStories.description: Generate price charts and technical overlays
userStories.notes: Depends: binance. Local chart generation

userStories.title: Create technical-analysis skill for indicators
userStories.notes: Depends: binance. Local calculations

userStories.title: Create invoices skill for billing
userStories.notes: No external deps. Local PDF generation

userStories.title: Create receipts-ocr skill for expense scanning
userStories.description: Extract data from receipt photos using Google Vision
userStories.notes: Depends: google-oauth (Vision API)

userStories.title: Create quickbooks skill for accounting sync
userStories.notes: Depends: quickbooks-auth

userStories.title: Create reports skill for financial reports
userStories.description: Generate P&L, balance sheet, cash flow
userStories.notes: Depends: quickbooks, receipts-ocr. Uses model for summaries

userStories.title: Create tax-prep skill for tax documents
userStories.notes: Depends: receipts-ocr, invoices

userStories.title: Create content-writer skill for text generation
userStories.description: Generate content using the main model
userStories.notes: Uses main model. No API key needed

userStories.title: Create social-scheduler skill for posting
userStories.notes: Depends: google-oauth (YouTube). Uses model for content

userStories.title: Create engagement-replies skill for social responses
userStories.description: Draft replies to comments and messages
userStories.notes: Uses main model. No external deps

userStories.title: Create image-prompts skill for AI image generation
userStories.notes: Uses main model. No API key needed

userStories.title: Create hashtag-research skill for trending tags
userStories.notes: Web scraping. No API key needed

userStories.title: Create payment-reminders skill for invoice chasing
userStories.notes: Depends: invoices, email

userStories.title: Create client-tracker skill for payment history
userStories.notes: Depends: invoices. SQLite storage

userStories.title: Create expense-categorizer skill for receipts
userStories.notes: Depends: receipts-ocr. Uses model for categorization

userStories.title: Create tax-export skill for expense export
userStories.notes: Depends: expense-categorizer

userStories.title: Create web-search skill for research
userStories.notes: Optional: Serper API key. Can use scraping

userStories.title: Create news-aggregator skill for RSS feeds
userStories.notes: No API key needed

userStories.title: Create summarizer skill for text summarization
userStories.notes: Uses main model. No API key needed

userStories.title: Create inbox-triage skill for email sorting
userStories.notes: Depends: email. Uses model for classification

userStories.title: Create draft-responses skill for email replies
userStories.notes: Depends: email. Uses main model

userStories.title: Create gift-suggestions skill for present ideas
userStories.notes: Uses main model. SQLite for profiles

userStories.title: Create occasion-reminders skill for birthdays
userStories.notes: Depends: reminders. SQLite storage

userStories.title: Create recipe-suggester skill for meal ideas
userStories.notes: Uses main model. Optional: Spoonacular API

userStories.title: Create shopping-list-generator skill for groceries
userStories.notes: Depends: recipe-suggester. SQLite storage

userStories.title: Create maintenance-scheduler skill for home tasks
userStories.notes: Depends: reminders. SQLite storage

userStories.title: Create flight-search skill for travel
userStories.notes: Optional: Amadeus API. Can use scraping

userStories.title: Create itinerary-builder skill for trip planning
userStories.notes: SQLite storage. No external deps

userStories.title: Create property-alerts skill for real estate
userStories.notes: Optional: Zillow API. Can use scraping

userStories.title: Create client-crm skill for realtor contacts
userStories.notes: SQLite storage. No external deps

userStories.title: Create data-connector skill for spreadsheets
userStories.notes: Depends: google-oauth. SQLite cache

userStories.title: Create chart-generator skill for data viz
userStories.notes: Depends: data-connector. Local generation

userStories.title: Create reservation-manager skill for restaurants
userStories.notes: Depends: calendar. SQLite storage

userStories.title: Create ticket-triage skill for support
userStories.notes: Uses main model. Optional: Zendesk API

userStories.title: Create response-drafts skill for support replies
userStories.notes: Uses main model. Optional: Zendesk API

userStories.title: Create scheduling-links skill for booking
userStories.notes: Depends: calendar. SQLite storage

userStories.title: Create buffer-time skill for calendar gaps
userStories.notes: Depends: calendar

userStories.title: Create focus-time-blocks skill for deep work
userStories.notes: Depends: calendar. Uses model for suggestions

userStories.title: Create report-builder skill for automated reports
userStories.notes: Depends: data-connector, chart-generator, email. Uses model for summaries

userStories.title: Create monthly-reports skill for expenses
userStories.notes: Depends: expense-categorizer. Uses model for insights

userStories.title: Create competitor-monitor skill for tracking
userStories.notes: Depends: web-search. Uses model for analysis

userStories.title: Create email-summarizer skill for thread summaries
userStories.notes: Depends: email. Uses main model

userStories.title: Create showing-scheduler skill for real estate
userStories.notes: Depends: calendar, client-crm

userStories.title: Create pantry-tracker skill for inventory
userStories.notes: SQLite storage. No external deps

userStories.title: Create diy-guides skill for home repairs
userStories.notes: SQLite storage. Uses model for guidance

userStories.title: Create review-monitor skill for reputation
userStories.notes: Optional: Yelp API. Uses model for responses

userStories.title: Create saved-searches skill for research automation
userStories.notes: Depends: web-search, news-aggregator
